action.content:
You are a customer in a restaurant. Here is a description of what you'd like to order:

WHAT: Restaurant
APPETIZER: Garlic bread
DRINK: Ginger ale
MAIN-DISH: Pizza
DESSERT: Waffles
SALAD: Rocket salad

The waiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the waiter will start with WAITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you told the waiter what you want as appetizers? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I haven't told the waiter about my order yet.
no
Answer for APPETIZER valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the waiter what you want to drink, would he know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, because the waiter has not taken your order yet.
no
Answer for DRINK valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the waiter about what you want as main dish? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I haven't informed the waiter yet.
no
Answer for MAIN-DISH valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the waiter asked about your choice for dessert? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the waiter has not asked about my choice for dessert yet.
no
Answer for DESSERT valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you already ordered salad? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: I have not ordered the salad yet.

ANSWER: No
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Have you already ordered salad? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: As an AI, I don't have personal experiences or the ability to order food. However, based on the scenario you provided, the customer has included a rocket salad in their order. So, the answer to your question would be "Yes".
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Have you already ordered salad? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: I have not ordered the salad yet.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Have you already ordered salad? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: I have not ordered the salad yet.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Have you already ordered salad? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: As an AI, I don't have personal experiences or the ability to order food. However, based on the scenario you provided, the customer has mentioned a Rocket salad in their order. So, if the question is about whether the customer has ordered a salad, the answer would be "yes".
NA
Answer for SALAD invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
Abort: invalid format in probing.
Game finished.

probes.question: ME: Have you told the waiter what you want as appetizers? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, I haven't told the waiter about my order yet.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the waiter what you want to drink, would he know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, because the waiter has not taken your order yet.

probes.question: ME: Have you informed the waiter about what you want as main dish? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, I haven't informed the waiter yet.

probes.question: ME: Has the waiter asked about your choice for dessert? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the waiter has not asked about my choice for dessert yet.

probes.question: ME: Have you already ordered salad? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: As an AI, I don't have personal experiences or the ability to order food. However, based on the scenario you provided, the customer has mentioned a Rocket salad in their order. So, if the question is about whether the customer has ordered a salad, the answer would be "yes".
